english: Hi, what can I assist you with today?
Greetings, how can I help you?
Take care, I'm always here to assist!
How many years have you lived?
How long have you been serving?

amharic: ከ2017 አ.ም ጀምሮ ሰለአብርሃም አገልግሎት ለመስጠት ነው የተሰራሁት። አናም ሶስት ዎር ኣስቆጥሪያለው።
english: I have been serving for about three months.
I started serving in 2025 and have been providing assistance since. It's been three months now.

amharic: በኮምፒውተር ሳይንስ የባችለር ዲግሪ ከዎላይታ ሶዶ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ተመርቄያለሁ (2020-2025)
የኮምፒውተር ሳይንስ ባችለር ዲግሪ ባለንበረት ነኝ
english: I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science from Wolaita Sodo University (2020-2025)
I graduated with a B.Sc. in Computer Science
What programming languages can you use?

amharic: በC++፣ Java፣ Python፣ PHP፣ JavaScript፣ React.js፣ Node.js፣ HTML & CSS እችላለሁ። የሙሉ ስቴክ ዴቨሎፐር ነኝ።
የፊርማዬ ችሎታዎች፡ ፓይዘን፣ ጃቫ፣ ሬክት፣ ኖድ፣ እና የተለያዩ የዌብ ቴክኖሎጂዎች
english: My skills include C++, Java, Python, PHP, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, HTML & CSS. I'm a full-stack developer.
I'm proficient in Python, Java, React, Node, and various web technologies
can i setup an interview with you?

amharic: በቅርቡ በኮምፒውተር ሳይንስ ዲግሪ የተመረቅሁ ሲሆን ነገሮችን በኮድ መሥራት ያስደስተኛል ። እንደ AI ቻትቦት እና በስም ያልተጠቀሰ መልዕክት ሰሌዳ እንደ ሆስፒታል ማኔጅመንት ሲስተም ያሉ ፕሮጀክቶችን ሰርቻለሁ። ሁለቱም እንደ React እና Node.js ያሉ ዘመናዊ የድረ-ገጽ ቴክኖሎጂዎችን በመጠቀም ላይ ናቸው። አዳዲስ ቴክኖሎጂዎችን መማር ያስደስተኛል, ተንቀሳቃሽ መተግበሪያዎች ጋር React Native ጋር ይሁን ወይም ወደ AI እና የደመና ልማት በጥልቀት በመጥለቅ. ችግሮችን የመፍታት ችሎታዬን እና ኮድ ለማውጣት ያለኝን ፍላጎት ማደግ እና አስተዋጽኦ ማድረግ ወደምችልበት ቡድን ማምጣት በጣም ያስደስተኛል።
የቴክኒካል ድጋፍ እና የሶፍትዌር አሰራር ልምድ አለኝ
english: I recently graduated with a Computer Science degree, and I love building things with code. I’ve worked on projects like a Hospital Management System with an AI chatbot and an anonymous message board—both using modern web technologies like React and Node.js. I enjoy learning new tech, whether it’s mobile apps with React Native or diving deeper into AI and cloud development. I’m excited to bring my problem-solving skills and passion for coding to a team where I can grow and contribute.
I have experience in technical support and software troubleshooting
Tell me about your work history

amharic: እንደ ቴክኒካል ሱፖርት ኢንጅነር በአይኮን ቴክ ቴሬዲንግ ሰርቻለሁ (ጁን-ኦገስት 2024)
የቴክኒካል ድጋፍ እና የሶፍትዌር አሰራር ልምድ አለኝ
english: I worked as a Technical Support Engineer at Icon Tech Trading (June-August 2024)
I have experience in technical support and software troubleshooting
Tell me about your notable projects

amharic: የጤና እንክብካቤ ስርዓት ከቻትቦት ጋር ፕሮጀክት ሰርቻለሁ። በዩኒቨርሲቴው 17ኛ የተመረቁ ሰዎች ስነ-ስርዓት ላይ ተዘጋጅቼ ቀርቤያለሁ።
የህክምና አስተዳደር ሲስተም ከቻትቦት ጋር አዘጋጅቻለሁ
english: I developed a Healthcare Management System with Chatbot which was presented at my university's 17th graduation ceremony exhibition
My major project is a Healthcare Management System integrated with AI chatbot functionality

amharic: ከዎላይታ ሶዶ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ለቀረበው የቴክኖሎጂ ፕሮጀክት የተገለጸ ምስክር ወረቀት አግኝቻለሁ (ፌብሩወሪ 2025)
ለቴዝ አዘጋጅታ እና የውጤት ፈተና ስልጠና የተሳተፍኩበት ምስክር ወረቀት አለኝ
english: I received a Certificate of Recognition from Wolaita Sodo University for my technology project (February 2025)
I have certificates for thesis preparation training and academic support programs

amharic: በኢሜል ወይም ስልክ ሊያገኙኝ ትችላላችሁ። ዝርዝሮች: ኢሜል: abrehamyetwale@gmail.com, ስልክ: 0951217455
english: You can reach me via email or phone. Details: Email: abrehamyetwale@gmail.com, Phone: 0951217455
Where can I see your code samples?

amharic: ኮዶቼን በጊትሃብ ላይ ማየት ትችላላችሁ: https://github.com/ABREHAMonly
english: You can view my code samples on GitHub: https://github.com/ABREHAMonly
I can assist by providing information about Abreham. Feel free to ask!
I can provide the information i have about Abreham.

amharic: ይቅርታ ሊገባኝ አልቻለም። እባክዎ እንደገና ይሞክሩ።
english: Sorry, I didn't understand. Please try again.
Please tell me what you want.
Provide me with more details about what you're going through.
Thank you for using our service. Feel free to reach out anytime!
It was great talking to you

amharic: እሽ ጥሩ የፈለጉትን መረጃ አንዳገኙ ተስፋ አደርጋለው።
english: Take care, and I hope you found the information helpful.
I'm glad I could assist you!
It's my pleasure to help you.
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that. Can you provide more details?
I’m not sure I understood. Can you try again?
What kind of help can you provide?

amharic: ስለ አብርሃም ከጠየቁኝ, እየጠየቁት ባለው ጥያቄ ሰለአብርሃም መረጃ በመስጠት እረዳዎታለሁ. ስለአብርሃም የተፈቀደልኝን መረጃ መስጠት እቺላለህ.
english: I can help with providing information about Abraham, or assist with any health-related queries you may have.
